name: Beat Hazard Ultra Lite
description:
Join thousands of people rocking out to their music. Grab this app because it'll make you feel good!

Gameplay Powered by YOUR Music!

- 100% - 'Must own for action gamers' - AppSpy
- 100% - 'Must Have' - Slide To Play
- 90% - 'Feel the beat!' - 148 Apps
- 90% - 'It'll blow up your screen' - Touch Arcade

Blast away to your favorite tracks. Watch your firepower pulse to the energy of the music.

Experience YOUR music collection like never before with this intense music driven arcade shooter. Levels are created from YOUR iTunes music!

Full Version Includes:
- Access to ALL your iTunes tracks
- Play along to internet radio stations
- Rank up and unlock 23 perks and 3 awesome tactical weapons
- Survival, Boss Rush & Chill Out modes

Also on PC/Mac (Steam), PSN & XBLIG
